title: Validation is Key ( Jazzy Jeff Interview and Ask C and E)
itunes:title: Validation is Key ( Jazzy Jeff Interview and Ask C and E)
description:
Today on the show we had legend Jazzy Jeff stop by for the first time, where he spoke on Bel-Air and the official podcast for the show, the culture now and then, Covid and so much more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a young woman who believed that she was a great driver while driving drunk, until reality caught up to her and she sadly ended up killing 2 troops and a pedestrian while under the influence. Next, its time for Ask C and E, where Charlamagne and Envy fill in for Yee and give our listeners their most unapologetic advice, and during the segment they even brought back the chemistry between a couple, after SHE cheated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
